meta.job_title: Director of Online Graduate and Professional Education Programs

duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct the development of online programs and strategic priorities for online program development based on market data
Manage the appointment of instructors and the creation of course modules in collaboration with various departments and external platforms
Review programs annually for course quality, student satisfaction, and enrollment, and support recruiting efforts
Coordinate the development of non-credit professional certificate programs and courses and work with faculty to develop proposals for asynchronous courses on an external platform
Interface with students, lead discussion sections, and provide advisement and support to students
Manage budget, develop revenue plan, and track expenditures and revenue related to online program delivery
Track student outcomes, measure student satisfaction, and develop metrics for program success

education_certification.credential: Master's Degree in Public Health or a related field (or equivalent combination of education and experience)
